title: Jordan Klepper
itunes:title: Jordan Klepper
description:
Jordan Klepper [The Daily Show, The Opposition with Jordan Klepper, Kasich & Klepper] talks with Anna about the meaning and sentiment behind “Make America Great Again”, the normalization of extreme language and opinions, Jordan’s January 6th experience, why we find conspiracy theories so compelling, and much more.


Be sure to check out Kasich & Klepper wherever you get your podcast.


Today’s first caller is Kate who, after a ten-year long friendship, has recently come to see the guy in a new light. Now she wonders if confessing her feelings to him is worth putting their friendship at risk.


Next, Anna and Jordan talk with Olivia who, after agreeing to a “friends with benefits” relationship, realizes she’s falling for the guy and doesn’t know what to do about it.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
